properties.name: fractional
properties.summary: Whether to include the fractional portion, where the number of decimal places are implied by pattern or explicit 'places' parameter. The value [true,false] makes the fractional portion optional.

properties.name: locale
properties.summary: override the locale used to determine formatting rules

properties.name: pattern
properties.summary: override formatting pattern with this string. Default value is based on locale. Overriding this property will defeat localization. Literal characters in patterns are not supported.

properties.name: strict
properties.summary: strict parsing, false by default. Strict parsing requires input as produced by the format() method. Non-strict is more permissive, e.g. flexible on white space, omitting thousands separators

properties.name: type
properties.summary: choose a format type based on the locale from the following: decimal, scientific (not yet supported), percent, currency. decimal by default.
